title: Urban gardening programs
context: [ยง201H-4.5] Urban gardening programs. Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the corporation may develop programs that provide incentives for the development of housing projects that incorporate urban gardening programs; provided that the college of tropical agriculture and human resources of the University of Hawaii at Manoa shall be consulted regarding best practices in urban gardening, including vertical gardening, aquaponics, and community gardening. [L 2013, c 202, ยง2]
